Malaria: Malaria is a deadly disease that affects millions of people worldwide, and a cure for it would have a huge impact on global health.
Cancer: Curing cancer would save countless lives and alleviate the suffering of those affected by it.

Mental Health Disorders: Mental health disorders affect millions of people and can have a huge impact on their quality of life. A cure for these disorders would greatly improve the lives of those affected.
Infectious Diseases: Infectious diseases like tuberculosis, HIV/AIDS, and hepatitis C affect millions of people worldwide and would be a great priority to cure.

Aging: Aging is a natural process, but it can be slowed down or even reversed with the right technology. This would greatly improve the quality of life for many people and allow them to live longer and healthier lives.
